participant_1.background:
I've lived in many places, but I grew up in a small town in the Midwest.
I'm not a morning person, but I love reading mystery novels.
I am a welder who is passionate about the craft and is always looking for new ways to improve my skills.
I treasure my collection of vintage clothing.
i am not married.

participant_2.background:
I often take my best friend to my grandmother's place for a visit.
i am an aspiring writer.
I usually do laundry once a week because I have four daughters and they go through a lot of clothes.
i am afraid of clowns.
I remember listening to the radio with my father and singing along to the songs.

content.text: I'm not a morning person either. What do you like to do in the morning?
I usually take my best friend to my grandmother's place for a visit.
That sounds like a nice way to start the day! What do you like to do there?
We usually just hang out and talk. We also sometimes do some crafts together.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I wish I had a grandmother to visit.
I'm glad you think so! She's pretty great. What do you do for a living?
I'm a welder. I really enjoy the work, but it can be challenging at times.
That's really cool! I've always been fascinated by welding. Do you like making things?
I do, it's a lot of fun to see something come together from a pile of metal.
I wish I had more of a creative side. I'm more of a writer.
That's great too! I love to read, but I'm not very good at writing.
We should trade sometime! I could use some help with my editing.
That sounds like a great idea! I'd be happy to help.
